name: 2D Platformer Game (Rappe34)
description:
2D platformer school project.
In developement.

Gameplay
Avoid the obstacles and get to the bottom of each level without dying.
(Only 1 level right now tho, In the future more)

Plans for the game
In the future i'm planning to add to the game:

  • More levels
  • Collectible gold or other valuables in the levels
  • Enemies
  • Timer and win screen
